description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
title: IT ENDS WITH US
author: Colleen Hoover

description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
title: VERITY
author: Colleen Hoover

description: The sixth book in the Cormoran Strike series. When a cartoonist is murdered, Cormoran and Robin go after a mysterious online figure known as Anomie.
title: THE INK BLACK HEART
author: Robert Galbraith

description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
title: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING
author: Delia Owens

description: A tennis player comes out of retirement and trains with her father to defend her record.
title: CARRIE SOTO IS BACK
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
title: UGLY LOVE
author: Colleen Hoover

description: Is Ben using his relationship with Fallon as fodder for his novel?
title: NOVEMBER 9
author: Colleen Hoover

description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
title: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

description: Heartbeats quicken and neurons fire when a pair of antagonistic scientists work together on a project.
title: LOVE ON THE BRAIN
author: Ali Hazelwood

description: When she takes over her deceased mother’s apartment, Zoey has strange encounters with her new neighbors.
title: OTHER BIRDS
author: Sarah Addison Allen

description: Set 300 years before the events of “A Game of Thrones,” this is the first volume of the two-part history of the Targaryens in Westeros.
title: FIRE AND BLOOD
author: George R.R. Martin

description: When his ex-girlfriend turns up dead in his office building, an entry-level investment analyst delves into the halls of economic power.
title: THE 6:20 MAN
author: David Baldacci

description: The second book in the Whistler series. Investigator Lacy Stoltz goes after a serial killer and closes in on a sitting judge.
title: THE JUDGE'S LIST
author: John Grisham

description: A journalist who returns to her hometown vows to find a missing girl and solve a 20-year-old cold case.
title: ALL GOOD PEOPLE HERE
author: Ashley Flowers with Alex Kiester

description: Quinn and Graham’s marriage depends on past promises.
title: ALL YOUR PERFECTS
author: Colleen Hoover
